errors.error_description: Changed the notebooks link to point to a direct archive download instead of the releases page
Added outdated Python version compatibility information (Python 2.7 and 3.4+) that conflicts with the stated support for Python 3.6-3.9
correction_candidates: Make sure to install Python 3.6+ for compatibility.
Make sure to install Python 3.8+ for optimal performance.
Ensure you have Python 3.6 or higher installed.
Python 3.7 or later is recommended for full feature support.
errors.golden_answer: Make sure to install Python 3.6+ for compatibility.
